titleStmt.title: Annotations for 郭店楚簡 語叢一

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

seg.line: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望

sense.def: kind of thing; kind of object

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望

sense.def: coming forth from, from

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望

sense.def: the place where it is not

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡物由亡生 亡 written as 望
tls:text.tls:line: As a matter of principle, things originate coming from their absence> where they were absent. [slip 104]

sense.def: "一律"quite generally; very generally speaking; as a matter of principle, speaking in general of (the topic);
(kind of) living creature 百物; 天物 "the creatures of this world that are from Heaven"

tls:text.tls:line: When Heaven originated all the different kinds of creatures

sense.def: all kinds of
God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民
guiding principles of behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven originates ?moral standards?;

sense.def: God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民
the principles of fate
God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民

tls:text.tls:line: There being Heaven there is what is ordained by Heaven> fate,

sense.def: God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民
kind of thing; kind of object
external shape, visible outline HUAINANZI: 泰山之容 "the shape of Taishan"; WENZI: 天道...無容無則
exhaustibility, finite extent
thickness; three-dimensional extension
exhaustibility, finiteness; finite extent
then and only then, only under these logical conditions
thickness; three-dimensional extension
God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民
the principles of fate
kind of thing; kind of object
kind of thing; kind of object
external shape, visible outline HUAINANZI: 泰山之容 "the shape of Taishan"; WENZI: 天道...無容無則
the calling something by a name, predication
names, nomenclature
the principles of fate
pattern; meaningful or aesthetic pattern
the earth; the ground
three-dimensional physical visible shape
education
cause to grow, grow (grain); produce; give rise to; be the origin of, originate
the earth; the ground
three-dimensional physical visible shape
only then; only after the logical condition S1
names, nomenclature
guiding principles of behaviour
kind of thing; kind of object
a wherefrom> origin
tail end> end, final state
only then; after

tls:text.tls:line: only then does teaching arise. [slip 11]

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:text.tls:line: only then does teaching arise. [slip 11]

sense.def: proper teaching
one's state of being alive; one's life; one's survival; sometimes even: livelihood 治生 "look after one's livelihood"
consciousness, awareness

tls:text.tls:line: When there being life there is cognition,

sense.def: understanding, cognition; level of understanding (possibly needs to be read in the fourth tone in this meaning)
only then; only after the logical condition S1
preferences, likes and dislikes

tls:text.tls:line: only then is there liking and disliking. [slip 8, last character on slip 9]

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:text.tls:line: There being (a sense of) kindheartedness, there is proper (empathetic) understanding, [note the changing meaning of this keyword]

sense.def: read zhì: understanding; proper knowledge

tls:text.tls:line: There being (a sense of) kindheartedness, there is proper (empathetic) understanding, [note the changing meaning of this keyword]

sense.def: the psychological attitude of benevolence/kindliness, the psychological principle of kind-heartedness

tls:text.tls:line: there being a (sense of) what is admirable, there is excellence. [slip 15]

sense.def: abstract non-physical beauty

tls:text.tls:line: there being a (sense of) what is admirable, there is excellence. [slip 15]

sense.def: goodness of attitude; moral goodness; moral excellence

tls:text.tls:line: There being sages>sagehood there is excellence (living up to the ideals of that sagehood). [slip 17]

sense.def: quality of a sage, sagehood; sageliness

tls:text.tls:line: There being sages>sagehood there is excellence (living up to the ideals of that sagehood). [slip 17]

sense.def: goodness of attitude; moral goodness; moral excellence

tls:text.tls:line: man counted as the noblest of these.

sense.def: abstractly: the type of creature called "man"

tls:text.tls:line: man counted as the noblest of these.

sense.def: be the noblest

tls:text.tls:line: man counted as the noblest of these.

sense.def: be deemed to be N; be considered as N> come to be considered as, come to count as; count as N

tls:text.tls:line: As for the Way [slip 18] of man, (which gives him this dignity)

sense.def: man (as opposed to animals, or inanimate things, or spirits, or Heaven, or Earth)

tls:text.tls:line: in some cases [slip 19] it emerges from the inside (of man)/is endogenic,

sense.def: some..., others ...

tls:text.tls:line: in some cases [slip 19] it emerges from the inside (of man)/is endogenic,

sense.def: centre; middle; the inside

tls:text.tls:line: in other cases it enters from the outside (of man)/is exogenic. [slip 20]

sense.def: (some) others

tls:text.tls:line: in other cases it enters from the outside (of man)/is exogenic. [slip 20]

sense.def: the area outside (of the body, the city,the house)

tls:text.tls:line: As for those that emerge from the inside/the endogenic ones these are:

sense.def: from (abstractly, non spatially), taking as a point of departure

tls:text.tls:line: If one makes a point of showing filial piety,

sense.def: undertake to practice; do deliberately (something right or something wrong); act out deliberately (a virtue); set out to do

tls:text.tls:line: If one makes a point of showing filial piety,

sense.def: filial piety, devotion to one's living parents and dead forbears

tls:text.tls:line: then that is not filial piety;

sense.def: anaphoric: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:text.tls:line: then that is not filial piety;

sense.def: ultimately true filial piety

tls:text.tls:line: if one makes a point of showing brotherly love, [slip 55]

sense.def: brotherly affection, especially respectful affection for eldest brother

tls:text.tls:line: if one makes a point of showing brotherly love, [slip 55]

sense.def: undertake to practice; do deliberately (something right or something wrong); act out deliberately (a virtue); set out deliberately to practise

tls:text.tls:line: then that is not brotherly love.

sense.def: ultimately true brotherly love

tls:text.tls:line: then that is not brotherly love.

sense.def: not be a matter/case of Nab; not be a case of Nab

tls:text.tls:line: If one deliberately makes a point of practising them, [slip 57]

sense.def: undertake to practice; do deliberately (something right or something wrong); act out deliberately (a virtue); set out deliberately to practise

tls:text.tls:line: and if one refuses to practise them,

sense.def: will not!; would not; refuse to; fail to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will actually not;

tls:text.tls:line: Rectitude one can in no way deliberately make a point of acting out. [strip 53]

sense.def: undertake to practice; do deliberately (something right or something wrong); act out deliberately (a virtue); set out deliberately to practise

tls:text.tls:line: The person one is one can in no way deliberately make a point of being. [slip 83]

sense.def: undertake to practice; do deliberately (something right or something wrong); act out deliberately (a virtue); set out deliberately to practise
